name: Stellarium Charting
description:
Stellarium Charting is a game made 72 hours for the LD50 game jam, with theme Delay the inevitable.
It was made using java, krita, and aseprite.


The galaxy is dying, and the last constellations are slowly fading out. Chart a new constellation to try and prevent the sky from going dark, for as long as possible.

Controls:

  • Right Mouse Button (Drag) - Connect one star to another.
  • Shift + Hover a star - View details about that star, like how many connections it still has available, and how many more stars can connect to it.
  • Left Mouse Button (Drag) - Drag around objects.
